clean_data: Systems Administrator span lSystemsspan span lAdministratorspan Systems Administrator Work Experience Systems Administrator MNGI Digestive Health Minneapolis MN July 2015 to July 2019 Oversaw the implementation and management of Unitrends Recovery system establishing a multisite redundant disaster recovery system that saved company manhours network bandwidth and hardware resources Designed and instituted redundant systems policies and procedures for disaster recovery and data archiving that enhanced protection and integrity of network infrastructure Managed the installation configuration and maintenance of network equipment physical and virtual servers including VMWare and Citrix Xen as well as network storage devices Administered Active Directory including folder and file access GPO administration DHCP and DNS Established best practices and policies for the installation maintenance and troubleshooting of enduser hardware software and peripheral devices Maintained compliance with company standard operating procedures through regularlyscheduled security patches Systems Administration Engineer Scantron Corporation Eagan MN October 2013 to July 2015 As one of two staff members with government clearance coordinated data housing and backup of critical IRS data which included maintaining network and storage devices as well as physical and virtual servers Used Backup Exec and Windows Server to execute backup and restore tasks for Survey Services department Served as the Lead Architect for the relocation of all storage systems including the move and build out of the datacenter Provided remote and onsite technical support for workstations and other devices collaborating with external support staff on additional system and network infrastructure projects Network AdministratorIS Specialist US Probation Pretrial Services District of Minnesota June 2000 to October 2013 Administered Window Server network including troubleshooting and maintenance of hardware for five offices as part of transition of 80 employees from a single network to a WAN Resolved network outages and performance reductions in conjunction with thirdparty vendors Executed physical server and backup system installations and configurations Education Bachelor of Science in Cybersecurity and Information Assurance Western Governors University 2022 Associate of Applied
